Package org.tweetyproject.arg.peaf.analysis

Class AbstractAnalysis

java.lang.Object
org.tweetyproject.arg.peaf.analysis.AbstractAnalysis
All Implemented Interfaces:
JustificationAnalysis
Direct Known Subclasses:
ApproxAnalysis, ConcurrentApproxAnalysis, ConcurrentExactAnalysis, ExactAnalysis, PreferredAnalysis
public abstract class AbstractAnalysis extends Object implements JustificationAnalysis
AbstractAnalysis provides utility functions for concrete implementations
Author:
Taha Dogan Gunes

    • createResult

      protected AnalysisResult createResult(double probability, long noIterations, double totalProbability)
      It's called when the analysis is complete.
      Parameters:
      probability - the probability value found as a result
      noIterations - the number of iterations done for the analysis
      totalProbability - computed for correctness (in exact analysis)
      Returns:
      an Analysis object

    • computeContributionOfAniEAF

      protected double computeContributionOfAniEAF(Set<EArgument> args, InducibleEAF inducibleEAF)
      Computes the contribution of an induced EAF to the justification analysis.

      Before computing the contribution with extensions, several checks are done. 1. If the queried args are not found in the EAF, return 0. 2. If there are no attacks, return 1.0. 3. If the queried args have no attack, return 1.0 4. Otherwise, convert EAF to DAF and run the given extension reasoner. - If one of the extension has the query, return 1.0.

      Parameters:
      args - the query as a set of arguments
      inducibleEAF - an induced EAF object
      Returns:
      the contribution for the analysis

    • createDAF

      protected DungTheory createDAF(EAFTheory eafTheory)
      Creates a virtual DAF from EAFTheory without including the support links This is not a great conversion method, however works good for queries.
      Parameters:
      eafTheory - an EAFTheory object
      Returns:
      a DungTheory object

      Parameters:
      args - the set of arguments necessary for the query
      Returns:
